name: ListDocgenBatchJobs
description:
Retrieve details of Box Doc Gen jobs in a batch.

Use this tool to get a list of Box Doc Gen jobs contained within a specific batch using the batch ID.

parameters.name: box_doc_gen_batch_id
parameters.description: The identifier for a Box Doc Gen batch used to retrieve specific job details.

parameters.name: pagination_marker
parameters.description: The position marker to start returning results. Use for marker-based pagination. Requires `usemarker` set to `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: maximum_items_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page when retrieving Box Doc Gen jobs.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
